pkgmetadata.longdescription:
You need an account from https://www.sheepit-renderfarm.com to use this product.
The list of Blender versions supported can be found at: https://www.sheepit-renderfarm.com/index.php?show=binaries
For Blender, it can use Internal, Eevee, or Cycles renderer.
Project requirements can be found at: https://www.sheepit-renderfarm.com/getstarted.php

use.flag: Checks for OpenCL support for Intel CPUs that may be required.

Prefer AMDGPU-PRO drivers with HWE (aka LTS [long term support]). HWE allows for xserver 1.20.x compatibility instead of 1.17.x HardWare Enabled for newer GPU products; otherwise, use the more Gentoo compatible release cycle driver.

Checks for proper OpenCL support for GPUs. It will also patch the software for OpenCL to work on Linux. Not supported upstream. See https://github.com/laurent-clouet/sheepit-client/issues/165 for details.
Checks for proper OpenCL support for pre-Vega 10 from AMDGPU-PRO drivers.
Checks for proper OpenCL support for Vega 10 (GCN 5.x) or newer from AMDGPU-PRO drivers.
Checks for proper OpenCL support for Vega 10 (GCN 5.x) or newer from ROCm.
Pulls the required dependencies if Pro support in the AMDGPU-PRO driver has not been installed.
Preference for the bundled AMDGPU-PRO drivers.
Preference for the split AMDGPU-PRO packages.
Checks for OpenCL support for the AMDGPU-PRO drivers.
Checks if the GPU driver is OpenCL Checks if the GPU driver is OpenCL for Mesa Gallium3D users.
